is attested by a Notary Publick & his Clerk , half a years
will be due upon it the 5 th . of April
Two Years in equal yearly payments this Security I propose

next Friday evening . The Duke & Dutcheſs of Atholl have been in Town about a fortnight with their whole Family ; they have a House in Hanover Square formerly inhabited by the Imperial Minister . I beg
remain with great regard , Dear Sir , Your faithful & Obliged Humble Servant Frederick Hamilton Oxford Street -- 249 February 10
